description: Enterprise reporting table for no add single items in Patient Education (PED) records.

columns.name: PED_ID
columns.description: The Unique ID for the Patient Education Record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: Patient Identifier to for which the Education record is created. Stored in internal format and can be used to link to patient record.

columns.name: METHOD_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category item that specifies method of education.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: RESPONSE_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Category item that specifies learner's response to the education.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: INSTANT_NOADD_EDIT
columns.description: Date/Time stamp for the instance when the patient education record was last edited.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status category number for the patient education record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted
